title: Shoutout to the artist who made Aubeelion Sol

replies.body:
WHY DOESN'T THIS EXIST
WE NEED A SKIN LINE
BRING THIS AND QUEEN BEE SYNDRA IN THE GAME NOW RIOT!
Bee Knight Orrn, Purely so I can throw gargantuan bees at people
Beekeper Lulu, although she's about to get a new skin

https://image.ibb.co/cU0zmK/Beemo_Emote.png

#Bzzz

> [{quoted}](name=OniZetsu666,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=B8nPmM9e,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-01T18:47:01.457+0000)
>
> WHY DOESN'T THIS EXIST
> WE NEED A SKIN LINE
> BRING THIS AND QUEEN BEE SYNDRA IN THE GAME NOW RIOT!

Im clueless too tbh.
Aurelion has Sooooo many skin concepts, Void, Undead, Thunderlord, Bee 
and only just now 2 years later does he get his first skin

> [{quoted}](name=OniZetsu666,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=B8nPmM9e,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2018-08-01T18:47:01.457+0000)
>
> WHY DOESN'T THIS EXIST
> WE NEED A SKIN LINE
> BRING THIS AND QUEEN BEE SYNDRA IN THE GAME NOW RIOT!

Mé like this idea mé will make it happen fan wise at least :'>
Bug/Dragon Pokemon everyone dreamed off.

> [{quoted}](name=EnergonVlada,realm=EUNE,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=B8nPmM9e,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-08-01T19:04:20.837+0000)
>
> Bug/Dragon Pokemon everyone dreamed off.

Right?
Un**bee**lieavable! :3

I assume the stars would be bees ?!Because that sounds amazing.
The skin concept needs some more work though, but the idea is definetely great.

Also a reminder of my Queen Bee Syndra skin concept over here:
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/skin-champion-concepts/oHLH9UKQ-skin-idea-queen-bee-syndra

https://cdnb.artstation.com/p/assets/images/images/009/310/767/original/thorsten-erdt-syndra-gif.gif?1518262141
The tail is... awkward.. maybe add the stinger and have like a gradient honey trail coming off the stinger, not just.. coming out of the butt....
i think Beerelion Sol fits better as a name
Maybe, I just went withthe name that the Artist had already.
Aurelion Bee Sol
This is wonderful.

https://i.4pcdn.org/pol/1412594964335.png
WHY DO I NEED THIS?!?

Looks too bright for me, some orange or brown aspects would make it better.



P.S. why does it have 4 eyes?

>P.S. why does it have 4 eyes?

Where do you see another 2 set of eyes lol?

Bee type of eye on his head (where his jaws should be) and a little bit above them is a blue one. 

And other 2 are on the other side.
You're looking at the skin wrong, the little blue ones are actual eyes and the big black things on his jawline are either mandibles or just decor
I guess it could be mandibles, but they're kinda fat and plump to be it.
Why doesn't {{champion:96}} have one? he literally spits out honey
Groooooosssss XD
{{sticker:sg-lux}}
I’d hate to see that flying in my yard
Holy shit its fucking beautiful :O
Lol this skin conception doesn't fit at all ASol and looks too awkward to see at.
Why not just call it Aure-bee-on Sol?
AURE-BEE-ON-NIIIIIIIIIGHTS!

> [{quoted}](name=Mokuto Bunshi,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=B8nPmM9e,comment-id=000c0000,timestamp=2018-08-02T18:21:36.816+0000)
>
> AURE-BEE-ON-NIIIIIIIIIGHTS!

I'm sorry, but I don't quite get it.
{{sticker:sg-lux-2}}

I'll give u a hint XD
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=19Y8ViF3Om0

It looks pretty cool, as most bee skins, too bad Aurelion won't get another skin in the next 6 years after Mecha one.

I'm still rooting for Waspwick btw

That is glorious; I wouldn't personally use it, but it needs to be a thing none the less!

(I'm a massive Sci-Fi nerd and I'm not planning on getting Mecha Sol either....)
I'm guessing you weren't that satisfied with the quality/visuals of Mecha Aurelion Sol either huh?
I just don't like the way it looks; I'm not saying it's bad, it just doesn't sit with my personal preferences. I prefer his Release skin both the looks and how the theme fits my idea of the champion.
